item.title: Where Does Your Medicine Come From?: MakeOverMonday 2018 Week 8
item.description: Goal of this Visualization task is to create a visualization for the Drug and Medicine Exports data for different countries. In this blog post, Iâ€™m trying to find the leading countries in Export across these 5 years.
